explanation: [0-0] On a brown wooden table, a stack of clean white plates is placed on the left side, while cooked meat mixed with rice, red vegetables, lemon slices, and other foods is placed on the right side. These foods are arranged on silver tin foil. A person is standing by the table, holding a plate with beige and red food in their right hand.

[0-4] Then the camera moves to the right, the hand holding the plate shakes slightly, a silver tong appears on the right side, a hand wearing a white transparent glove is picking up food and tearing the meat. As the camera continues to move to the right, the hand holding the plate on the left gradually disappears from the screen. On the right side, you can also see a person holding a silver spoon, stretching the food to the upper left.
